name: Transam-Madmax
description:
Transam-Madmax

Tweak of graphics and difficulty of 22/April/2008. Tranzam. Neil Walker.

Editor
------
You can create your own mini-games (race, survivor, cup hunt) by using the supplied editor. Consult the 
levels\designer folder readme file.

Main Game
---------
Collect 8 cups and win the race. Avoid the enemy 'black turbo cars'. Except in this game they're
green because Graham liked it better that way, and who am I to argue.

Easy mode shows you where the enemy cars are. Normal mode, doesn't and also has more cars. Hard 
mode is just a bit harder. You can only upload your highscore when not in easy mode.

Mini-Games
----------
Race: various race type games that are either against the computer, time trials or beat the clock
Quiz: can you navigate to a U.S. state given the state's name? or perhaps given just it's capital?
Survivor: stay alive as long as possible
